archimate:Requirement.name: AC-2(2): Account Management | Automated Temporary and Emergency Account Management
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Automatically [Selection: remove; disable] temporary and emergency accounts after [Assignment: organization-defined time period for each type of account].

properties.value: Management of temporary and emergency accounts includes the removal or disabling of such accounts automatically after a predefined time period rather than at the convenience of the system administrator. Automatic removal or disabling of accounts provides a more consistent implementation.
